mobileAppsData.description: Share status updates, post video, make comments, and more. The app integrates with other apps on your phone, so you can see Facebook info in your Contacts or upload directly from Photos to Facebook.
mobileAppsData.title: Facebook for Palm

mobileAppsData.description: Post to Twitter and view your home tweets, mentions, messages, lists, favorites, and more in a unique timeline view. See what’s trending and find out why it’s popular.
mobileAppsData.title: TweetMe

mobileAppsData.description: Update your Google Latitude location or view the locations of your friends and family. You can run the app in the background without needing to keep any cards open.
mobileAppsData.title: Google Latitude Assistant

mobileAppsData.description: View public and private Picasa web albums on your phone. The easy-to-use interface lets you flip, pan, and zoom photos and look at them in portrait or landscape mode.
mobileAppsData.title: Picasa On Phone

mobileAppsData.description: Get a fast and intuitive way to search, browse, save, and share public images from Flickr, Bing, Photobucket, and Google.
mobileAppsData.title: PictureIt

mobileAppsData.description: Upload pictures to your Twitter account via Twitpic without having to use email.
mobileAppsData.title: Picture Tweet

mobileAppsData.description: Share your restaurant experience with your friends on Gowalla.<sup>1</sup> Check in, publish it to Facebook<sup>®</sup>, and get your passport stamped so you can earn rewards. While you’re thinking of it, launch the Facebook app and see what your friends are doing tonight—or send a tweet using Bad Kitty. Palm lets you keep more than one app open at the same time. Then flip back to Gowalla and look up other fun spots near you.<sup>3</sup>
mobileAppsData.title: Gowalla

mobileAppsData.description: Explore trends, receive alerts, and join the global conversation with this Twitter client. Did a plane just land in the Hudson? What happened on TV last night? Find out with Tweed.
mobileAppsData.title: Tweed

mobileAppsData.description: Discover a new way to explore your city. Check in with Foursquare about where you are and get recommendations on places to go and things to do nearby.
mobileAppsData.title: Foursquare

mobileAppsData.description: Enjoy Twitter in style. Accessible to everyone from the casual user to the power Tweeter, Bad Kitty makes it easy to post to multiple accounts. Just type to tweet.
mobileAppsData.title: Bad Kitty

mobileAppsData.description: Leverage the power of your professional network on the go. Find contact information quickly, learn more about the person you're about to meet, and accept or send invitations.
mobileAppsData.title: LinkedIn

mobileAppsData.description: Get a unique spin on Twitter for your Palm webOS phone. Break off custom search cards and get notifications when new updates appear—even explore Twitter without an account.
mobileAppsData.title: Spaz

mobileAppsData.description: This Facebook<sup>®</sup> client sends you notifications when your friends change their status or comment on yours. You can also respond to status updates from friends and view their photos.
mobileAppsData.title: FriendsFlow

mobileAppsData.description: Receive notifications when someone winks at you or emails your profile. Use the location feature to connect with members near you. Both are exclusive to Palm webOS.
mobileAppsData.title: Match.com

mobileAppsData.description: The answer to “Where r u?” This app finds your current location and lets you share it by email or text message. Perfect for quickly letting someone know where you are.
mobileAppsData.title: Send My Location

mobileAppsData.description: Enjoy Twitter on your phone without sacrificing any features. Twee gives you notifications, updates your location, and finds tweets of people nearby. Track trends, see URLs, and share photos.
mobileAppsData.title: Twee

mobileAppsData.description: Post photos, video, audio, and files directly from your webOS phone to over a hundred services across the social web, including Facebook, MySpace, Twitter, Flickr, WordPress, and more.
mobileAppsData.title: Pixelpipe Uploader to the Social Web

mobileAppsData.description: Capture your life, tag it, and share it. photoWall makes it easy to take a photo and post it to your favorite site—like photoWall.com, Facebook, Flickr, or Twitter—with just a tap.
mobileAppsData.title: Photowall

mobileAppsData.description: Write and edit posts for your WordPress blog on your phone. You can also upload photos, add links, and edit tags and categories. Save them on the phone and post when you're done.
mobileAppsData.title: Poster

mobileAppsData.description: Make posting links easy with this URL shortener. Enter a long web address and get a small, readable link to use in email, IM, texting, microblogging, and more.
mobileAppsData.title: Urloid
